text: One of the Assistant Inspectors of Buildings shall hereafter also perform the duties of Inspector of Elevators and Fire Escapes, without additional compensation.

Miscellaneous Notes

New implementing regulations: Pursuant to this section, the following new regulations were adopted in 1984: The "Apartment House Elevator Act of 1984" (D.C. Law 5-132, Mar. 13, 1985, 32 DCR 1717).
